name: Slugy - URL Shortener
description: Fast, secure, and open-source link management tool with analytics, QR codes, and bio links

DATABASE_URL.description: Neon PostgreSQL database connection string. Get it from: https://neon.tech

BETTER_AUTH_URL.description: Better Auth URL - will be set automatically

NEXT_BASE_URL.description: Base URL - will be set automatically

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: GitHub OAuth App Client ID. Create at: https://github.com/settings/applications/new

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google OAuth Client ID. Create at: https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_URL.description: Upstash Redis REST URL. Get it from: https://upstash.com

RESEND_API_KEY.description: Resend API Key for emails. Get it from: https://resend.com

GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Google Gemini AI API Key (optional). Get it from: https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey

NEXT_PUBLIC_ROOT_DOMAIN.description: Your custom domain for short links
